title: Manage an Engine Test Cell
description: After an engine overhaul, it must be run in a test cell to verify its performance before it can be returned to service.

tasks.description: Mount the engine in the test cell and connect all fuel, electrical, and data lines.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent ensures the engine is correctly installed in the test cell.

tasks.description: Run the engine at various power settings, from idle to full thrust, according to a standard test procedure.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent operates the engine and follows the test plan.

tasks.description: Record all performance parameters (thrust, fuel flow, temperatures, pressures) and verify they meet the manufacturer's specifications.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent collects all data and confirms the engine is performing within limits.
